api_list.name: ICAI Chartered Accountant Verification
api_list.description: This API checks the genuineness of the CA membership. Use the GET Call in the bundle to fetch result of the request_id received in the response.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://icai-chartered-accountant-verification.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/ind_icai"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "icai-chartered-accountant-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
